name: wp-papi/papi
description: WordPress Page Type API with custom fields

scripts.post-install-cmd: if [ -f vendor/bin/phpcs ]; then "vendor/bin/phpcs" --config-set installed_paths vendor/wp-coding-standards/wpcs; fi
scripts.post-update-cmd: if [ -f vendor/bin/phpcs ]; then "vendor/bin/phpcs" --config-set installed_paths vendor/wp-coding-standards/wpcs; fi
